title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Science Literacy Enhancement Course through Mobile-Based Situated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundation in basic scientific theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-world science problems with over 80% accuracy using mobile devices
Learners perform peer assessments and feedback at least three times using collaborative tools in mobile learning environments
Learners produce two or more science knowledge application case studies as portfolios based on situational learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
